2. STIG formally requests instruction on which documents to ingest
3. CEO authorizes specific documents, order, and analytical purpose

g1_exit_conditions.note: No minimum time requirement. G1 ends when truth is known.

ceo_closing_statement: We did not build FjordHQ to admire governance. We built it to compound freedom. G1 begins now because usefulness, not correctness, is the next truth.
